stack: CloudFormation template for GitLab role and permissions
issue: Role has broad permissions for logs:DescribeLogGroups on all log groups. This violates the principle of least privilege.

stack: CloudFormation template for GitLab role and permissions
issue: Role has broad codepipeline:ListPipelines permission that allows access to all pipelines. This violates the principle of least privilege.

stack: CloudFormation template for GitLab role and permissions
issue: No validation for server-side encryption requirement on S3 upload permissions for the source code bucket.

stack: CloudFormation template for GitLab role and permissions
issue: Missing resource tagging for the IAM role, violating consistent resource tagging requirement.

stack: CloudFormation template for GitLab role and permissions
issue: Cross-account role assumption from GitLab account introduces potential security risk if GitLab account is compromised.
